title: FRQ Score
stimulusHtml:
Select a point value to view scoring criteria and/or translations and to score the response.

One point is awarded for each correctly answered simple subquestion. One point is awarded for each correctly answered part (A or B) of a complex subquestion.

Note: Some answers provided below may have acceptable variants. Teachers should use their discretion in accepting alternative answers.
descriptions:
The response does not accurately include any of the answers below.

· Subquestion 1 (one point)

· genitive singular

· Subquestion 2 (one point)

· marriage/dowry

· Subquestion 3 (one point)

· all of it

· Subquestion 4 (one point)

· (they) have the power of/control over life and death

· Subquestion 5[A] (one point)

· natus: (having been) born

· loco: in/from/to/of place, rank, position

· illustriore: rather/more conspicuous, illustrious, noble, notable

· Subquestion 5[B] (one point)

· ablative

· Subquestion 6 (one point)

· suspicious death of the husband
The response accurately includes one of the answers below.
The response accurately includes two of the answers below.
The response accurately includes three of the answers below.
The response accurately includes four of the answers below.
The response accurately includes five of the answers below.
The response accurately includes six of the answers below.
The response accurately includes all seven of the answers below.
